sentences.english: The South Korean puppet regime must return my daughter to her mother's arms right away.
sentences.chinese: 韩国傀儡政权必须马上送还我的女儿到母亲的怀抱。

sentences.english: No longer like puppet, not as acted upon a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 不再像木偶，不采取行动作为一个傀儡。

sentences.english: There's no reason Nepal should be a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 没道理尼泊尔应该做傀儡。

sentences.english: Single living for others is a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 单为别人的评价而活着的人无异于傀儡。
他们不能和傀儡讨价还价。

sentences.english: He has loyal, and well paid, military officials to perform the role of figurehead.
sentences.chinese: 他自有受到他丰厚收买的忠实军事领导当他的傀儡。

sentences.english: That indicates you’re merely a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 这说明你只不过是一个傀儡。

sentences.english: Golems of stone, metal, straw, and even flesh exist.
sentences.chinese: 石头，金属，稻草，甚至是血肉构成的傀儡存在着。

sentences.english: No pre-show and no stooges, just the real deal.
sentences.chinese: 没有前显示和没有傀儡，真正的成交。

sentences.english: For example, puppet show is the best cut point to research.
sentences.chinese: 其中，傀儡戏皮影戏是一个分析研究的最佳切入点。

sentences.english: The Vichy in France during the Second World War were German Stooges.
sentences.chinese: 法国的维希在二战期间成为了德国的傀儡政府。

sentences.english: More than 25 warriors and creatures from Goblins to Golems and Ice Guards.
sentences.chinese: 超过25个战士和生物的妖精傀儡和冰卫队。

sentences.english: The big noise of the cannon frighted the enemy army.
sentences.chinese: 隆隆的大炮声把傀儡军吓坏了。

sentences.english: The "Manchukuo" Puppet Regime was a figurehead set up by the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 伪满政府是由日本扶持建立的傀儡政权。

sentences.english: He realises, you sense, that he's the sock puppet of a maniac.
sentences.chinese: 正如你认识到的，他意识到自己是这个疯子的傀儡。

definition: to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
person willing to sacrifice his life (for a good cause)
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
